TopicTitle: How to Change SpaceDock Mod Title Name?

Articles.Content: I don't know if this is the place to ask, but I can't find answer anywhere. How do you change your mod title on Spacedock? I updated the panel mod, but my Spacedock title says 5.0 when it is 5.1. I wanted to change that title of mod to be 5.1, so people are not confused.

1 hour ago, therealcrow999 said:

I can't find answer anywhere

On the bottom of the spacedock.info web page  there are links for Support, Discord, and IIRC. You may be able to find your answer through one of those.

Not possible currently; it comes up every now and then and a short debate among SD devs ensues. Comment here to tell VITAS about your pain; he kind of defends the current limitations in those debates:

  • https://github.com/KSP-SpaceDock/SpaceDock/issues/62

In the meantime a good rule of thumb is to use the name field for the actual name and leave things that might change like the versioning and dependencies to other fields like the version or the description.

Edited February 15, 2021 by HebaruSan

When I released Kerbalism Simplex i wanted to change the original.  But couldn't so I started a new mod.

True Story.

Peace.

Yeah it is strange. I think easy thing for me was to delete mod and reupload it.

Thanks guys.
